chapters.title: Chapter 34:  Judgment
chapters.info: Arrela Shiego, p. 531—Tall, lanky, dark-haired Tairen woman. She was taken captive by the Shaido along with Faile. She got protection from some people in the camp who would otherwise harm her by “climing into the blankets” of the Maidens who captured her. She is described as “brusque,” and is taller than most Maidens. She is not interested in men, at least not “that way.”
